[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-utils](./harp-utils.md) &gt; [ContextLogger](./harp-utils.contextlogger.md)

## ContextLogger class

Context-aware logger that decorates log message with stack-based prefix, emits `headerMessage` before first actual log message.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ContextLogger implements IContextLogger 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(m\_logger, headerMessage)](./harp-utils.contextlogger._constructor_.md) |  | Construct a context-aware logger that logs to <code>m_logger</code>. |

|  [headerMessage](./harp-utils.contextlogger.headermessage.md) |  | string |  |
|  [info](./harp-utils.contextlogger.info.md) |  | (message: string, ...rest: any\[\]) =&gt; void |  |

|  [warn](./harp-utils.contextlogger.warn.md) |  | (message: string, ...rest: any\[\]) =&gt; void |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [pop()](./harp-utils.contextlogger.pop.md) |  |  |
|  [pushAttr(name)](./harp-utils.contextlogger.pushattr.md) |  | Push "attribute-like" context.<!-- -->Following log messages will be prefixed with <code>name</code> or <code>.name</code> depending on current context. |
|  [pushIndex(index)](./harp-utils.contextlogger.pushindex.md) |  | Push "index-like" context.<!-- -->Following log messages will be prefixed with <code>[index]</code>. |
